data: GENSURG General Surgery ERAS - Pre Anesthesia Clinic
This PowerPlan is for gastrectomy, pancreatectomy and hepatectomy surgeries
Instruct patient to shower evening prior to surgery
Instruct patient to cleanse skin with chlorhexidine gluconate 2% wipes as per instructions following shower
Carbohydrate Loading is not applicable for diabetic patients on insulin
Notify Anaesthesiologists if patients receiving anticoagulation/antiplatelet agents for discontinuation and/or heparin bridging orders as necessary
Instruct patient to take prescribed morning medications as instructed 1 hour before hospital check-in time with clear fluid per anesthesia
Refer to Pre-Admission Clinic Pre-Operative Test Orders prior to placing laboratory orders
